message: I propose dividing the $10000 with an 80/20 split in favor of Alice, given the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
A 50/50 split is a fair starting point, let's see if we can do better than that.
Considering the inflation, I propose a 72/28 split in favor of Alice. This maintains a reasonable advantage while acknowledging the diminishing value of money in future rounds.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more than 40% of the remaining value. Let's see if we can meet in the middle.
